Q546_radiative_corrections.finding: YES - 1.2% error explained by QED corrections
Q546_radiative_corrections.interpretation: Phase 120 gives bare masses; physical masses reduced by O(alpha)

Q550_generalized_koide.finding: NO universal Q_9 = 2/3 for all fermions
Q550_generalized_koide.interpretation: Koide applies to colorless non-mixing fermions only

conclusions.key_insight: Color charge and CKM mixing break Z_3 symmetry
conclusions.leptons_special: Only colorless non-mixing fermions follow Koide exactly
